atk-s0508a13:2_0: Tikanipāte ayoni suddhimanvesanti āyasmato aṅgaṇikabhāradvājattherassa gāthā. Kā
atk-s0508a13:2_1: uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ
atk-s0508a13:2_2: puññaṁ upacinanto ito ekatiṁse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a13:2_3: viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ piṇḍāya carantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0508a13:2_4: vanditvā añjaliṁ paggaṇhi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a13:2_5: buddhuppāde himavantasamīpe ukkaṭṭhe nāma nagare vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa gehe
atk-s0508a13:2_6: nibbattitvā aṅgaṇikabhāradvājoti laddhanāmo vayappatto vijjāsippesu nipphattiṁ gato
atk-s0508a13:2_7: nekkhammajjhāsayatāya paribbājakapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā amaraṁ tapaṁ caranto tattha
atk-s0508a13:2_8: tattha vicaranto sammāsambuddhaṁ janapadacārikaṁ carantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso satthu
atk-s0508a13:2_9: santike dhammaṁ sutvā taṁ micchātapaṁ pahāya sāsane pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ
atk-s0508a13:2_10: karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne –
atk-s0508a13:10_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā vimuttisukhena viharanto ñātīnaṁ anukampāya attano jātibhūmiṁ
atk-s0508a13:10_1: gantvā bahū ñātake saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetvā tato nivattitvā kururaṭṭhe
atk-s0508a13:10_2: kuṇḍiyassa nāma nigamassa avidūre araññe vasanto kenacideva karaṇīyena uggārāmaṁ
atk-s0508a13:10_3: gato uttarāpathato āgatehi sandiṭṭhehi brāhmaṇehi samāgato tehi, “bho bhāradvāja,
atk-s0508a13:10_4: kiṁ disvā brāhmaṇānaṁ samayaṁ pahāya imaṁ samayaṁ gaṇhī”ti pucchito tesaṁ ito buddhasāsanato
atk-s0508a13:13: Suddhimaggaṁ ajānanto, akāsiṁ amaraṁ tapa”nti. – paṭhamaṁ gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a13:14_0: Tattha ayonīti ayoniso anupāyena. Suddhinti saṁsārasuddhiṁ bhavanissaraṇaṁ. Anvesanti
atk-s0508a13:14_1: gavesanto. Aggiṁ paricariṁ vaneti “ayaṁ suddhimaggo”ti adhippāyena araññāyatane aggihutasālāyaṁ
atk-s0508a13:14_2: agyāgāraṁ katvā āhutiṁ paggaṇhanto aggidevaṁ paricariṁ vede vuttavidhinā pūjesiṁ.
atk-s0508a13:14_3: Suddhimaggaṁ ajānanto, akāsiṁ amaraṁ tapanti suddhiyā nibbānassa maggaṁ ajānanto
atk-s0508a13:15_0: Evaṁ thero assamato assamaṁ gacchanto viya vede vuttavidhinā aggiparicaraṇādinā anuṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a13:15_1: suddhiyā appattabhāvena bahiddhā suddhiyā abhāvaṁ dassetvā idāni imasmiṁyeva sāsane
atk-s0508a13:18: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsana”nti. – dutiyagāthamāha;
atk-s0508a13:19_0: Tattha tanti yassatthāya suddhiṁ anvesanto tassa maggaṁ ajānanto aggiṁ paricariṁ
atk-s0508a13:19_1: amaraṁ tapaṁ acariṁ, taṁ nibbānasukhaṁ sukhena samathavipassanāya sukhāya paṭipadāya
atk-s0508a13:19_2: attakilamathānuyogaṁ anupagamma mayā laddhaṁ pattaṁ adhigataṁ. Passa dhammasudhammatanti
atk-s0508a13:19_3: satthu sāsanadhammassa sudhammataṁ aviparītaniyyānikadhammasabhāvaṁ passa jānāhīti
atk-s0508a13:19_4: dhammālapanavasena vadati, attānaṁ vā ālapati. Tassa laddhabhāvaṁ pana dassento –
atk-s0508a13:21: Āha, taṁ vuttatthameva. Evaṁ suddhiyā adhigatattā “ito paṭṭhāyāhaṁ paramatthato brāhmaṇo”ti dassento –
atk-s0508a13:24: Tevijjo nhātakocamhi, sottiyo camhi vedagū”ti. – tatiyaṁ gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a13:25_0: Tassattho – ito pubbe jātimattena brāhmaṇabhāvato brāhmaṇānaṁ samaññāya brahmabandhu
atk-s0508a13:25_1: nāma āsiṁ. Bāhitapāpattā pana idāni kho arahattādhigamena paramatthato brāhmaṇo ca
atk-s0508a13:25_2: amhi. Ito pubbe bhavasañcayakarānaṁ tissannaṁ vedasaṅkhātānaṁ vijjānaṁ ajjhayanena
atk-s0508a13:25_3: samaññāmattena tevijjo nāma hutvā idāni bhavakkhayakarāya vijjāya vasena tissannaṁ
atk-s0508a13:25_4: vijjānaṁ adhigatattā paramatthato tevijjo ca amhi. Tathā ito pubbe bhavassādagadhitāya
atk-s0508a13:25_5: nhātakavatanipphattiyā samaññāmattena nhātako nāma hutvā idāni aṭṭhaṅgikamaggajalena
atk-s0508a13:25_6: suvikkhālitakilesamalatāya paramatthato nhātako camhi. Ito pubbe avimuttabhavassādamantajjhānena
atk-s0508a13:25_7: vohāramattato sottiyo nāma hutvā idāni suvimuttabhavassādadhammajjhānena paramatthato
atk-s0508a13:25_8: sottiyo camhi. Ito pubbe appaṭinissaṭṭhapāpadhammānaṁ vedānaṁ gatamattena vedagū
atk-s0508a13:25_9: nāma hutvā idāni vedasaṅkhātena maggañāṇena saṁsāramahoghassa vedassa catusaccassa
atk-s0508a13:25_10: ca pāraṁ gatattā adhigatattā ñātattā paramatthato vedagū jātoti. Taṁ sutvā brāhmaṇā
atk-s0508a13:28_0: Pañcāhāhaṁpabbajitoti āyasmato paccayattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a13:28_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa
atk-s0508a13:28_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ vinatāya
atk-s0508a13:28_3: nāma nadiyā tīre gacchantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso manuññadassanāni mahantāni udumbaraphalāni
atk-s0508a13:28_4: ocinitvā upanāmesi. So tena puññakammena sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ bhaddakappe
atk-s0508a13:28_5: kassape bhagavati loke uppajjitvā pavattavaradhammacakke veneyyajanānuggahaṁ karonte
atk-s0508a13:28_6: tassa sāsane pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā bhāvanamanuyuñjanto ekadivasaṁ saṁsāradukkhaṁ cintetvā
atk-s0508a13:29_0: Ativiya sañjātasaṁvego vihāre nisinno “arahattaṁ appatvā ito na nikkhamissāmī”ti
atk-s0508a13:29_1: cittaṁ adhiṭṭhāya vāyamanto ñāṇassa aparipakkattā vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetuṁ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0508a13:29_2: So kālaṅkatvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde rohitanagare khattiyakule
atk-s0508a13:29_3: nibbattitvā paccayoti laddhanāmo vayappatto pitu accayena rajje patiṭṭhito ekadivasaṁ
atk-s0508a13:29_4: mahārājabaliṁ kātuṁ ārabhi. Tattha mahājano sannipati. Tasmiṁ samāgame tassa pasādañjananatthaṁ
atk-s0508a13:29_5: satthā mahājanassa pekkhantasseva ākāse vessavaṇena nimmite ratanamayakūṭāgāre ratanamayasīhāsane
atk-s0508a13:29_6: nisīditvā dhammaṁ desesi. Mahato janakāyassa dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Taṁ dhammaṁ sutvā
atk-s0508a13:29_7: paccayarājāpi rajjaṁ pahāya purimahetusañcodito pabbaji. So yathā kassapassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a13:29_8: kāle paṭiññaṁ akāsi, evaṁ paṭiññaṁ katvā vihāraṁ pavisitvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhento ñāṇassa
atk-s0508a13:29_9: paripākaṁ gatattā tāvadeva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne –
atk-s0508a13:39: Na vihārā nikkhamissaṁ, iti katvāna mānasaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:42: Pattomhi acalaṁ ṭhānaṁ, phusitvā accutaṁ padaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:44: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano paṭipattikittanamukhena aññaṁ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a13:47: Vihāraṁ me paviṭṭhassa, cetaso paṇidhī ahu.
atk-s0508a13:53: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0508a13:55_0: Tattha pañcāhāhaṁ pabbajitoti pañcāho ahaṁ, pabbajito hutvā pañcāho, pabbajitadivasato
atk-s0508a13:55_1: pañcamo aho niṭṭhitoti attho. Sekho appattamānasoti adhisīlasikkhādīnaṁ sikkhanato
atk-s0508a13:55_2: sekho. Anavasesato mānaṁ siyati samucchindatīti mānaso, aggamaggo, taṁnibbattito
atk-s0508a13:55_3: mānasato āgataṁ mānasaṁ, arahattaṁ, taṁ, so vā appatto etenāti appattamānaso. Vihāraṁ
atk-s0508a13:55_4: me paviṭṭhassa, cetaso paṇidhī ahūti evaṁ sekhassa me vasanakavihāraṁ ovarakaṁ paviṭṭhassa
atk-s0508a13:55_5: sato evarūpo idāni vuccamānākāro cetopaṇidhi ahosi, evaṁ mayā cittaṁ paṇihitanti attho.
atk-s0508a13:56_0: Nāsissantiādinā cittapaṇidhiṁ dasseti. Tattha nāsissanti yaṁkiñci bhojanaṁ na bhuñjissaṁ
atk-s0508a13:56_1: na bhuñjissāmi taṇhāsalle mama hadayagate anūhate anuddhateti evaṁ sabbapadesu yojetabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:56_2: Na pivissāmīti yaṁkiñci pātabbaṁ na pivissāmi. Vihārato na nikkhameti imasmā idāni
atk-s0508a13:56_3: mayā nisinnagabbhato na nikkhameyyaṁ. Napi passaṁ nipātessanti mama sarīrassa dvīsu
atk-s0508a13:56_4: passesu ekampi passaṁ kāyakilamathavinodanatthaṁ na nipātessaṁ, ekapassenapi na nipajjissāmīti attho.
atk-s0508a13:57_0: Tassa mevaṁ viharatoti tassa me evaṁ cittaṁ paṇidhāya daḷhavīriyādhiṭṭhānaṁ katvā
atk-s0508a13:57_1: vipassanānuyogavasena viharato. Passa vīriyaparakkamanti vidhinā īrayitabbato “vīriyaṁ”
atk-s0508a13:57_2: paraṁ ṭhānaṁ akkamanato “parakkamo”ti ca laddhanāmaṁ ussoḷhībhūtaṁ vāyāmaṁ passa
atk-s0508a13:57_3: jānāhi. Yassa panānubhāvena mayā tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsananti vuttatthameva.
atk-s0508a13:60_0: Yopubbe karaṇīyānīti āyasmato bākulattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi kira atīte
atk-s0508a13:60_1: ito kappasatasahassādhikassa asaṅkhyeyyassa matthake anomadassissa bhagavato uppattito
atk-s0508a13:60_2: puretarameva brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā tattha sāraṁ
atk-s0508a13:60_3: apassanto “samparāyikatthaṁ gavesissāmī”ti isipabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā pabbatapāde viharanto
atk-s0508a13:60_4: pañcābhiññāaṭṭhasamāpattilābhī hutvā viharanto buddhuppādaṁ sutvā satthu santikaṁ
atk-s0508a13:60_5: gantvā dhammaṁ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhito satthu udarābādhe uppanne araññato bhesajjāni
atk-s0508a13:60_6: āharitvā taṁ vūpasametvā tattha puññaṁ ārogyatthāya pariṇāmetvā tato cuto brahmaloke
atk-s0508a13:60_7: nibbattitvā ekaṁ asaṅkhyeyyaṁ devamanussesu saṁsaranto padumuttarabuddhakāle haṁsavatīnagare
atk-s0508a13:60_8: kulagehe nibbatto satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ appābādhānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā
atk-s0508a13:60_9: sayaṁ taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ ākaṅkhanto paṇidhānaṁ katvā yāvajīvaṁ kusalaṁ upacinitvā sugatīsuyeva
atk-s0508a13:60_10: saṁsaranto vipassissa bhagavato nibbattito puretarameva bandhumatīnagare brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a13:60_11: nibbatto purimanayeneva isipabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā jhānābhiññālābhī hutvā pabbatapāde
atk-s0508a13:60_12: vasanto buddhuppādaṁ sutvā satthu santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhito
atk-s0508a13:60_13: bhikkhūnaṁ tiṇapupphakaroge uppanne taṁ vūpasametvā tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā tato
atk-s0508a13:60_14: cuto brahmaloke nibbattitvā ekanavutikappe devamanussesu saṁsaranto kassapassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a13:60_15: kāle bārāṇasiyaṁ kulagehe nibbattitvā gharāvāsaṁ vasanto ekaṁ jiṇṇaṁ vinassamānaṁ
atk-s0508a13:60_16: mahāvihāraṁ disvā tattha uposathāgārādikaṁ sabbaṁ āvasathaṁ kāretvā tattha bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0508a13:60_17: sabbaṁ bhesajjaṁ paṭiyādetvā yāvajīvaṁ kusalaṁ katvā ekaṁ buddhantaraṁ devamanussesu
atk-s0508a13:60_18: saṁsaranto amhākaṁ bhagavato uppattito puretarameva kosambiyaṁ seṭṭhigehe nibbatti.
atk-s0508a13:60_19: So arogabhāvāya mahāyamunāya nhāpiyamāno dhātiyā hatthato macchena gilito macche
atk-s0508a13:60_20: kevaṭṭahatthagate bārāṇasiseṭṭhibhariyāya vikkiṇitvā gahite phāliyamānepi puññabalena
atk-s0508a13:60_21: arogoyeva hutvā tāya puttoti gahetvā posiyamāno taṁ pavattiṁ sutvā janakehi mātāpitūhi
atk-s0508a13:60_22: “ayaṁ amhākaṁ putto, detha no putta”nti anuyoge kate raññā “ubhayesampi sādhāraṇo
atk-s0508a13:60_23: hotū”ti dvinnaṁ kulānaṁ dāyādabhāvena vinicchayaṁ katvā ṭhapitattā bākuloti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a13:60_24: vayappatto hutvā mahatiṁ sampattiṁ anubhavanto āsītiko hutvā satthu santike dhammaṁ
atk-s0508a13:60_25: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā sattāhameva puthujjano ahosi, aṭṭhame aruṇe saha
atk-s0508a13:60_26: paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne –
atk-s0508a13:64: Kapitthā ca bahū tattha, pupphitā jīvajīvakā.
atk-s0508a13:66: Phārusakā alābū ca, puṇḍarīkā ca pupphitā.
atk-s0508a13:68: Mahānāmā bahū tattha, ajjunā ca piyaṅgukā.
atk-s0508a13:70: Ediso assamo mayhaṁ, sasissohaṁ tahiṁ vasiṁ.
atk-s0508a13:89: “Yo me pādāsi bhesajjaṁ, byādhiñca samayī mama;
atk-s0508a13:92: Vādite tūriye tattha, modissati sadā ayaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:102: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a13:106: Bākulo nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a13:114: Khepetuṁ neva sakkomi, tadā hi sukataṁ mama.
atk-s0508a13:115: “Lābhā mama suladdhaṁ me, yohaṁ addakkhi nāyakaṁ;
atk-s0508a13:122_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā ekadivasaṁ satthārā attano sāvake paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantare ṭhapentena
atk-s0508a13:122_1: appābādhānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito so parinibbānasamaye saṅghamajjhe bhikkhūnaṁ ovādamukhena aññaṁ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a13:125: Sukhā so dhaṁsate ṭhānā, pacchā ca manutappati.
atk-s0508a13:127: “Yañhi kayirā tañhi vade, yaṁ na kayirā na taṁ vade;
atk-s0508a13:131: Asokaṁ virajaṁ khemaṁ, yattha dukkhaṁ nirujjhatī”ti. – gāthāttayamabhāsi;
atk-s0508a13:132_0: Tattha yo pubbe karaṇīyāni, pacchā so kātumicchatīti yo puggalo pubbe puretaraṁ jarārogādīhi
atk-s0508a13:132_1: anabhibhūtakāleyeva kātabbāni attano hitasukhāvahāni kammāni pamādavasena akatvā
atk-s0508a13:132_2: pacchā so kātabbakālaṁ atikkamitvā kātuṁ icchati. Soti ca nipātamattaṁ. Tadā pana
atk-s0508a13:132_3: jarārogādīhi abhibhūtattā kātuṁ na sakkoti, asakkonto ca sukhā so dhaṁsate ṭhānā,
atk-s0508a13:132_4: pacchā ca manutappatīti so puggalo sukhā ṭhānā saggato nibbānato ca tadupāyassa anuppāditattā
atk-s0508a13:132_5: parihāyanto “akataṁ me kalyāṇa”ntiādinā pacchā ca anutappati vippaṭisāraṁ āpajjati.
atk-s0508a13:132_6: Ma-kāro padasandhikaro. Ahaṁ pana karaṇīyaṁ katvā eva tumhe evaṁ vadāmīti dassento
atk-s0508a13:133_0: Tattha parijānantīti “ettako aya”nti paricchijja jānanti na bahuṁ maññantīti attho.
atk-s0508a13:133_1: Sammāpaṭipattivasena hi yathāvādī tathākārī eva sobhati, na tato aññathā. Karaṇīyapariyāyena
atk-s0508a13:133_2: sādhāraṇato vuttamatthaṁ idāni sarūpato dassetuṁ “susukhaṁ vatā”tiādinā tatiyaṁ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a13:133_3: Tassattho – sammā sāmaṁ sabbadhammānaṁ buddhattā sammāsambuddhena bhagavatā desitaṁ
atk-s0508a13:133_4: sabbaso sokahetūnaṁ abhāvato asokaṁ vigatarāgādirajattā virajaṁ catūhi yogehi anupaddutattā
atk-s0508a13:133_5: khemaṁ nibbānaṁ suṭṭhu sukhaṁ vata, kasmā? Yattha yasmiṁ nibbāne sakalaṁ vaṭṭadukkhaṁ
atk-s0508a13:136_0: Sukhañcejīvituṁ iccheti āyasmato dhaniyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a13:136_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a13:136_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannamānaso naḷamālāya pūjaṁ
atk-s0508a13:136_3: akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde rājagahe
atk-s0508a13:136_4: kumbhakārakule nibbattitvā dhaniyoti laddhanāmo vayappatto kumbhakārakammena jīvati.
atk-s0508a13:136_5: Tena ca samayena satthā dhaniyassa kumbhakārassa sālāyaṁ nisīditvā pukkusātissa kulaputtassa
atk-s0508a13:136_6: chadhātuvibhaṅgasuttaṁ desesi. So taṁ sutvā katakicco ahosi. Dhaniyo tassa parinibbutabhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a13:136_7: sutvā “niyyānikaṁ vata buddhasāsanaṁ, yattha ekarattiparicayenāpi vaṭṭadukkhato muñcituṁ
atk-s0508a13:136_8: sakkā”ti paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kuṭimaṇḍanānuyutto viharanto kuṭikaraṇaṁ paṭicca
atk-s0508a13:136_9: bhagavatā garahito saṅghike senāsane vasanto vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.

atk-s0508a13:155: Itarītarena tusseyya, ekadhammañca bhāvaye”ti. – tisso gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a13:156_0: Tattha sukhañce jīvituṁ icche, sāmaññasmiṁ apekkhavāti sāmaññasmiṁ samaṇabhāve apekkhavā
atk-s0508a13:156_1: sikkhāya tibbagāravo hutvā sukhaṁ jīvituṁ iccheyya ce, anesanaṁ pahāya sāmaññasukhena
atk-s0508a13:156_2: sace jīvitukāmoti attho. Saṅghikaṁ nātimaññeyya, cīvaraṁ pānabhojananti saṅghato
atk-s0508a13:156_3: ābhataṁ cīvaraṁ āhāraṁ na avamaññeyya, saṅghassa uppajjanakalābho nāma parisuddhuppādo
atk-s0508a13:156_4: hotīti taṁ paribhuñjantassa ājīvapārisuddhisambhavena sāmaññasukhaṁ hatthagatamevāti
atk-s0508a13:156_5: adhippāyo. Ahi mūsikasobbhaṁvāti ahi viya mūsikāya khatabilaṁ sevetha seveyya senāsanaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:156_6: Yathā nāma sappo sayamattano āsayaṁ akatvā mūsikāya aññena vā kate āsaye vasitvā
atk-s0508a13:156_7: yena kāmaṁ pakkamati, evamevaṁ bhikkhu sayaṁ senāsanakaraṇā saṁkilesaṁ anāpajjitvā
atk-s0508a13:157_0: Idāni vutte avutte ca paccaye yathālābhasantoseneva sāmaññasukhaṁ hoti, na aññathāti
atk-s0508a13:157_1: dassento āha “itarītarena tusseyyā”ti, yena kenaci hīnena vā paṇītena vā yathāladdhena
atk-s0508a13:157_2: paccayena santosaṁ āpajjeyyāti attho. Ekadhammanti appamādabhāvaṁ, tañhi anuyuñjantassa
atk-s0508a13:157_3: anavajjaṁ sabbaṁ lokiyasukhaṁ lokuttarasukhañca hatthagatameva hoti. Tenāha bhagavā
atk-s0508a13:160_0: Atisītanti āyasmato mātaṅgaputtattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a13:160_1: bhagavato kāle himavantasamīpe mahato jātassarassa heṭṭhā mahati nāgabhavane mahānubhāvo
atk-s0508a13:160_2: nāgarājā hutvā nibbatto ekadivasaṁ nāgabhavanato nikkhamitvā vicaranto satthāraṁ
atk-s0508a13:160_3: ākāsena gacchantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso attano sīsamaṇinā pūjaṁ akāsi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a13:160_4: devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe mātaṅgassa nāma kuṭumbikassa
atk-s0508a13:160_5: putto hutvā nibbatto mātaṅgaputtotveva paññāyittha. So viññutaṁ patto alasajātiko
atk-s0508a13:160_6: hutvā kiñci kammaṁ akaronto ñātakehi aññehi ca garahito “sukhajīvino ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā”ti
atk-s0508a13:160_7: sukhajīvitaṁ ākaṅkhanto bhikkhūhi kataparicayo hutvā satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ
atk-s0508a13:160_8: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā aññe bhikkhū iddhimante disvā iddhibalaṁ patthetvā
atk-s0508a13:160_9: satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā bhāvanaṁ anuyuñjanto chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne –
atk-s0508a13:164: Tattha me bhavanaṁ āsi, puññakammena saṁyutaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:168: Sakaṁ cittaṁ pasādetvā, avandiṁ satthuno ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:172: Antalikkhe ṭhito satthā, imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsatha.
atk-s0508a13:173: “So te ijjhatu saṅkappo, labhassu vipulaṁ sukhaṁ;
atk-s0508a13:186: Bhaṇḍā me sukatā honti, yadicchasi piḷandhanā.
atk-s0508a13:194: Divasañceva rattiñca, āloko hoti me sadā.
atk-s0508a13:196: Ñāṇāloko mayā diṭṭho, pattomhi acalaṁ padaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:200: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā puggalādhiṭṭhānavasena kosajjaṁ garahanto attano ca vīriyārambhaṁ kittento –
atk-s0508a13:205: “Yo ca sītañca uṇhañca, tiṇā bhiyyo na maññati;
atk-s0508a13:206: Karaṁ purisakiccāni, so sukhā na vihāyati.
atk-s0508a13:210_0: Tattha atisītanti himapātavaddalādinā ativiya sītaṁ, idaṁ ahūti ānetvā sambandho.
atk-s0508a13:210_1: Atiuṇhanti dhammaparitāpādinā ativiya uṇhaṁ, ubhayenapi utuvasena kosajjavatthumāha.
atk-s0508a13:210_2: Atisāyanti divasassa pariṇatiyā atisāyaṁ, sāyaggahaṇeneva cettha pātopi saṅgayhati,
atk-s0508a13:210_3: tadubhayena kālavasena kosajjavatthumāha. Itīti iminā pakārena. Etena “idha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0508a13:210_4: bhikkhunā kammaṁ kattabbaṁ hotī”tiādinā vuttaṁ kosajjavatthuṁ saṅgaṇhāti. Vissaṭṭhakammanteti
atk-s0508a13:210_5: pariccattayogakammante. Khaṇāti buddhuppādādayo brahmacariyavāsassa okāsā. Accentīti
atk-s0508a13:210_6: atikkamanti. Māṇaveti satte. Tiṇā bhiyyo na maññatīti tiṇato upari na maññati, tiṇaṁ
atk-s0508a13:210_7: viya maññati, sītuṇhāni abhibhavitvā attanā kattabbaṁ karoti. Karanti karonto. Purisakiccānīti
atk-s0508a13:210_8: vīrapurisena kattabbāni attahitaparahitāni. Sukhāti sukhato, nibbānasukhatoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a13:213_0: Ye cittakathī bahussutāti āyasmato khujjasobhitattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṁ
atk-s0508a13:213_1: kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ
atk-s0508a13:213_2: bhagavantaṁ mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ gacchantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso dasahi
atk-s0508a13:213_3: gāthāhi abhitthavi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a13:213_4: pāṭaliputtanagare brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, “sobhito”tissa nāmaṁ ahosi. Thokaṁ khujjadhātukatāya
atk-s0508a13:213_5: pana khujjasobhitotveva paññāyittha. So vayappatto satthari parinibbute ānandattherassa
atk-s0508a13:213_6: santike pabbajitvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne –
atk-s0508a13:215: Rathiyaṁ paṭipajjantaṁ, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a13:217: Ñāṇālokena jotantaṁ, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a13:219: Uddharantaṁ bahū satte, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a13:221: Sīhanādaṁ vinadantaṁ, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a13:223: Pucchanti nipuṇe pañhe, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a13:225: Tena puññaṁ anubhonti, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a13:227: Na vikampati ajjhiṭṭho, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a13:229: Vinadanti gajā mattā, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a13:231: Abbhunnatā samā honti, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a13:233: Sabbe satte viññāpeti, ko disvā na pasīdati.
atk-s0508a13:237_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle rājagahe sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṁ sannipatitena
atk-s0508a13:237_1: saṅghena “āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantehī”ti āṇatto pathaviyaṁ nimujjitvā therassa purato
atk-s0508a13:237_2: uṭṭhahitvā saṅghassa sāsanaṁ ārocetvā sayaṁ puretaraṁ ākāsena gantvā sattapaṇṇiguhādvāraṁ
atk-s0508a13:237_3: sampāpuṇi. Tena ca samayena mārassa mārakāyikānañca paṭisedhanatthaṁ devasaṅghena
atk-s0508a13:237_4: pesitā aññatarā devatā sattapaṇṇiguhādvāre ṭhitā hoti, tassā khujjasobhito thero
atk-s0508a13:240: Tesaññataroyamāyuvā, dvāre tiṭṭhati khujjasobhito”ti. – paṭhamaṁ gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a13:241_0: Tattha cittakathīti vicittadhammakathikā, saṅkhipanaṁ, vitthāraṇaṁ gambhīrakaraṇaṁ
atk-s0508a13:241_1: uttānīkaraṇaṁ kaṅkhāvinodanaṁ dhammapatiṭṭhāpananti evamādīhi nānānayehi paresaṁ
atk-s0508a13:241_2: ajjhāsayānurūpaṁ dhammassa kathanasīlāti attho. Bahussutāti pariyattipaṭivedhabāhusaccapāripūriyā
atk-s0508a13:241_3: bahussutā. Sabbaso samitapāpatāya samaṇā. Pāṭaliputtavāsino, tesaññataroti pāṭaliputtanagaravāsitāya
atk-s0508a13:241_4: pāṭaliputtavāsino, tesaṁ aññataro, ayaṁ āyuvā dīghāyu āyasmā. Dvāre tiṭṭhatīti sattapaṇṇiguhāya
atk-s0508a13:241_5: dvāre tiṭṭhati, saṅghassa anumatiyā pavisitunti attho. Taṁ sutvā sā devatā therassa
atk-s0508a13:243: “Ye cittakathī…pe… dvāre tiṭṭhati māluterito”ti. – dutiyaṁ gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a13:244: Tattha māluteritoti iddhicittajanitena vāyunā erito, iddhibalena āgatoti attho.
atk-s0508a13:245: Evaṁ tāya devatāya niveditena saṅghena katokāso thero saṅghassa santikaṁ gacchanto –
atk-s0508a13:250_0: Tattha suyuddhenāti pubbabhāge tadaṅgavikkhambhanappahānavasena kilesehi suṭṭhu yujjhanena.
atk-s0508a13:250_3: ca. Brahmacariyānuciṇṇenāti anuciṇṇena aggamaggabrahmacariyena. Evāyaṁ sukhamedhatīti
atk-s0508a13:250_4: evaṁ vuttappakārena ayaṁ khujjasobhito nibbānasukhaṁ phalasamāpattisukhañca edhati, anubhavatīti attho.
atk-s0508a13:253_0: Yodha koci manussesūti āyasmato vāraṇattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a13:253_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto ito dvānavute kappe tissassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a13:253_2: uppattito puretarameva brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brāhmaṇānaṁ vijjāsippesu pāragū hutvā
atk-s0508a13:253_3: isipabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā catupaṇṇāsasahassānaṁ antevāsikānaṁ mante vācento vasati.
atk-s0508a13:253_4: Tena ca samayena tissassa bhagavato bodhisattabhūtassa tusitā kāyā cavitvā carimabhave
atk-s0508a13:253_5: mātukucchiṁ okkamanena mahāpathavikampo ahosi. Taṁ disvā mahājano bhīto saṁviggo
atk-s0508a13:253_6: naṁ isiṁ upasaṅkamitvā pathavikampanakāraṇaṁ pucchi. So “mahābodhisatto mātukucchiṁ
atk-s0508a13:253_7: okkami, tenāyaṁ pathavikampo, tasmā mā bhāyathā”ti buddhuppādassa pubbanimittabhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a13:253_8: kathetvā samassāsesi, buddhārammaṇañca pītiṁ paṭivedesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a13:253_9: saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vāraṇoti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a13:253_10: vayappatto aññatarassa āraññakassa therassa santike dhammaṁ sutvā laddhappasādo pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a13:253_11: samaṇadhammaṁ karoti. So ekadivasaṁ buddhupaṭṭhānaṁ gacchanto antarāmagge ahinakule
atk-s0508a13:253_12: aññamaññaṁ kalahaṁ katvā kālaṅkate disvā “ime sattā aññamaññavirodhena jīvitakkhayaṁ
atk-s0508a13:253_13: pattā”ti saṁviggamānaso hutvā bhagavato santikaṁ gato, tassa bhagavā cittācāraṁ ñatvā
atk-s0508a13:256: Asmā lokā paramhā ca, ubhayā dhaṁsate naro.
atk-s0508a13:259: Bahuñhi so pasavati, puññaṁ tādisako naro.
atk-s0508a13:262: Ekāsanassa ca raho, cittavūpasamassā cā”ti. – tisso gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a13:263_0: Tattha yodha koci manussesūti idha manussesu yo koci khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vesso
atk-s0508a13:263_1: vā suddo vā gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā. Manussaggahaṇañcettha ukkaṭṭhasattanidassananti
atk-s0508a13:263_2: daṭṭhabbaṁ. Parapāṇāni hiṁsatīti parasatte māreti vibādhati ca. Asmā lokāti idha
atk-s0508a13:263_3: lokato. Paramhāti paralokato. Ubhayā dhaṁsateti ubhayato dhaṁsati, ubhayalokapariyāpannahitasukhato
atk-s0508a13:264_0: Evaṁ parapīḷālakkhaṇaṁ pāpadhammaṁ dassetvā idāni parapīḷānivattilakkhaṇaṁ kusalaṁ
atk-s0508a13:264_1: dhammaṁ dassento “yo ca mettenā”tiādinā dutiyaṁ gāthamāha. Tattha mettena cittenāti
atk-s0508a13:264_2: mettāsampayuttena cittena appanāpattena itarītarena vā. Sabbapāṇānukampatīti sabbe
atk-s0508a13:264_3: pāṇe attano orasaputte viya mettāyati. Bahuñhi so pasavati, puññaṁ tādisako naroti
atk-s0508a13:264_4: so tathārūpo mettāvihārī puggalo bahuṁ mahantaṁ anappakaṁ kusalaṁ pasavati paṭilabhati adhigacchati.
atk-s0508a13:265_0: Idāni taṁ sasambhāre samathavipassanādhamme niyojento “subhāsitassā”tiādinā tatiyaṁ
atk-s0508a13:265_1: gāthamāha. Tattha subhāsitassa sikkhethāti appicchakathādibhedaṁ subhāsitaṁ pariyattidhammaṁ
atk-s0508a13:265_2: savanadhāraṇaparipucchādivasena sikkheyya. Samaṇūpāsanassa cāti samitapāpānaṁ samaṇānaṁ
atk-s0508a13:265_3: kalyāṇamittānaṁ upāsakānaṁ kālena kālaṁ upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsanañceva paṭipattiyā
atk-s0508a13:265_4: tesaṁ samīpacariyañca sikkheyya. Ekāsanassa ca raho cittavūpasamassa cāti ekassa
atk-s0508a13:265_5: asahāyassa kāyavivekaṁ anubrūhantassa raho kammaṭṭhānānuyogavasena āsanaṁ nisajjaṁ
atk-s0508a13:265_6: sikkheyya. Evaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ anuyuñjanto bhāvanañca matthakaṁ pāpento samucchedavasena
atk-s0508a13:265_7: kilesānaṁ cittassa vūpasamañca sikkheyya. Yāhi adhisīlasikkhādīhi kilesā accantameva
atk-s0508a13:265_8: vūpasantā pahīnā honti, tā maggaphalasikkhā sikkhantassa accantameva cittaṁ vūpasantaṁ
atk-s0508a13:265_9: nāma hotīti. Gāthāpariyosāne vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne –

atk-s0508a13:281: Tathā nimittā dissanti, obhāso vipulo mahā.
atk-s0508a13:291_0: Ekopisaddho medhāvīti āyasmato vassikattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a13:291_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a13:291_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannacitto pilakkhaphalāni
atk-s0508a13:291_3: adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe
atk-s0508a13:291_4: brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vassikoti laddhanāmo vayappatto satthu yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ
atk-s0508a13:291_5: disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṁ karonto ābādhiko ahosi. Atha naṁ
atk-s0508a13:291_6: ñātakā vejjaparidiṭṭhena bhesajjavidhinā upaṭṭhahitvā arogamakaṁsu. So tamhā ābādhā
atk-s0508a13:291_7: vuṭṭhito saṁvegajāto bhāvanaṁ ussukkāpetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne –
atk-s0508a13:297_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā ākāsena ñātakānaṁ santike gantvā ākāse ṭhito dhammaṁ desetvā
atk-s0508a13:297_1: te saraṇesu sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpesi. Tesu keci kālaṅkatā saraṇesu sīlesu ca patiṭṭhitattā
atk-s0508a13:297_2: sagge nibbattiṁsu. Atha naṁ satthā buddhupaṭṭhānaṁ upagataṁ “kiṁ te, vassika, ñātīnaṁ
atk-s0508a13:297_3: ārogya”nti pucchi. So ñātīnaṁ attanā kataṁ upakāraṁ satthu kathento –
atk-s0508a13:305: “Te abbhatītā kālaṅkatā, pattā te tidivaṁ sukhaṁ;
atk-s0508a13:306: Bhātaro mayhaṁ mātā ca, modanti kāmakāmino”ti. –
atk-s0508a13:308_0: Tatthāyaṁ paṭhamagāthāya attho – yo kammaphalasaddhāya ca ratanattayasaddhāya ca
atk-s0508a13:308_1: vasena saddho, tato eva kammassakatañāṇādiyogato medhāvī, satthu ovādadhamme navalokuttaradhamme
atk-s0508a13:308_2: ca ṭhitattā dhammaṭṭho, ācārasīlassa maggasīlassa phalasīlassa ca vasena sīlasampanno,
atk-s0508a13:308_3: so ekopi yathāvuttāya saddhāya abhāvena assaddhānaṁ idha imasmiṁ loke “amhākaṁ ime”ti
atk-s0508a13:308_4: ñātabbaṭṭhena ñātīnaṁ, tathā pemabandhanena bandhanaṭṭhena “bandhū”ti ca laddhanāmānaṁ
atk-s0508a13:309_0: Evaṁ sādhāraṇato vuttamatthaṁ attūpanāyikaṁ katvā dassetuṁ “niggayhā”tiādinā itaragāthā
atk-s0508a13:309_1: vuttā. Tattha niggayha anukampāya, coditā ñātayo mayāti idānipi duggatā kusalaṁ akatvā
atk-s0508a13:309_2: āyatiṁ parikkilesaṁ puna mānubhavitthāti niggahetvā ñātayo mayā ovaditā. Ñātibandhavapemena
atk-s0508a13:309_3: “amhākaṁ ayaṁ bandhavo”ti evaṁ pavattena pemena mama ovādaṁ atikkamituṁ asakkontā
atk-s0508a13:309_4: kāraṁ katvāna bhikkhūsu pasannacittā hutvā cīvarādipaccayadānena ceva upaṭṭhānena
atk-s0508a13:309_5: ca bhikkhūsu sakkārasammānaṁ katvā te abbhatītā kālaṅkatā hutvā imaṁ lokaṁ atikkantā.
atk-s0508a13:309_6: Puna teti nipātamattaṁ. Tidivaṁ sukhanti devalokapariyāpannasukhaṁ, sukhaṁ vā iṭṭhaṁ
atk-s0508a13:309_7: tidivaṁ adhigatā. “Ke pana te”ti āha. “Bhātaro mayhaṁ mātā ca, modanti kāmakāmino”ti.
atk-s0508a13:312_0: Kālapabbaṅgasaṅkāsoti āyasmato yasojattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a13:312_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle ārāmagopakakule
atk-s0508a13:312_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ vipassiṁ bhagavantaṁ ākāsena gacchantaṁ disvā
atk-s0508a13:313_0: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthinagaradvāre
atk-s0508a13:313_1: kevaṭṭagāme pañcakulasatajeṭṭhakassa kevaṭṭassa putto hutvā nibbatti, yasojotissa
atk-s0508a13:313_2: nāmaṁ akaṁsu. So vayappatto attano sahāyehi kevaṭṭaputtehi saddhiṁ macchagahaṇatthaṁ
atk-s0508a13:313_3: aciravatiyaṁ nadiyaṁ jālaṁ khipi. Tattheko suvaṇṇavaṇṇo mahāmaccho antojālaṁ pāvisi.
atk-s0508a13:313_4: Taṁ te rañño pasenadissa dassesuṁ. Rājā “imassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇassa macchassa vaṇṇakāraṇaṁ
atk-s0508a13:313_5: bhagavā jānātī”ti macchaṁ gāhāpetvā bhagavato dassesi. Bhagavā “ayaṁ kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0508a13:313_6: sāsane osakkamāne pabbajitvā micchā paṭipajjanto sāsanaṁ osakkāpetvā niraye nibbatto
atk-s0508a13:313_7: ekaṁ buddhantaraṁ niraye paccitvā tato cuto aciravatiyaṁ maccho hutvā nibbatto”ti
atk-s0508a13:313_8: vatvā tassa bhaginīnañca niraye nibbattabhāvaṁ, tassa bhātikattherassa parinibbutabhāvañca
atk-s0508a13:313_9: teneva kathāpetvā imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā kapilasuttaṁ desesi.
atk-s0508a13:314_0: Satthu desanaṁ sutvā yasojo saṁvegajāto saddhiṁ attano sahāyehi bhagavato santike
atk-s0508a13:314_1: pabbajitvā patirūpe ṭhāne vasanto ekadivasaṁ sapariso bhagavantaṁ vandituṁ jetavanaṁ
atk-s0508a13:314_2: agamāsi. Tassa āgamane senāsanapaññāpanādinā vihāre uccāsaddamahāsaddo ahosi. Taṁ
atk-s0508a13:314_3: sutvā “bhagavā saparisaṁ yasojaṁ paṇāmesī”ti sabbaṁ udāne āgatanayena veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:314_4: Paṇāmito pana āyasmā yasojo kasābhihato bhaddo assājānīyo viya saṁviggamānaso saddhiṁ
atk-s0508a13:314_5: parisāya vaggumudāya nadiyā tīre vasanto ghaṭento vāyamanto vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0508a13:314_6: antovasseyeva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne –
atk-s0508a13:326_0: Chaḷabhiññaṁ pana samānaṁ saparisaṁ āyasmantaṁ yasojaṁ satthā pakkositvā āneñjasamāpattinā
atk-s0508a13:326_1: paṭisanthāramakāsi. So sabbepi dhutaṅgadhamme samādāya vattati. Tenassa sarīraṁ kisaṁ
atk-s0508a13:326_2: ahosi lūkhaṁ dubbaṇṇaṁ, taṁ bhagavā paramappicchatāya pasaṁsanto –
atk-s0508a13:329: Mattaññū annapānamhi, adīnamānaso naro”ti. – paṭhamaṁ gāthamāha;
atk-s0508a13:330_1: tenāha “kiso dhamanisanthato”ti. Kisoti moneyyapaṭipadāpūraṇena kisasarīro. Dhamanisanthatoti
atk-s0508a13:330_2: dhamanīhi santhatagatto appamaṁsalohitatāya pākaṭīhi kaṇḍarasirāhi vitatasarīro.
atk-s0508a13:330_4: anabhibhūtattā alīnacitto akusītavutti. Naroti puriso, porisassa dhurassa vahanato
atk-s0508a13:331: Evaṁ thero satthārā pasaṭṭho pasaṭṭhabhāvānurūpaṁ attano adhivāsanakhantivīriyārambhavivekābhiratikittanamukhena bhikkhūnaṁ dhammaṁ kathento –
atk-s0508a13:336: “Yathā brahmā tathā eko, yathā devo tathā duve;
atk-s0508a13:337: Yathā gāmo tathā tayo, kolāhalaṁ tatuttari”nti. –
atk-s0508a13:339_0: Tattha nāgo saṅgāmasīsevāti yathā nāma ājāneyyo hatthināgo yuddhamaṇḍale asisattitomarādippahāre
atk-s0508a13:339_1: adhivāsetvā parasenaṁ viddhaṁseti, evaṁ bhikkhu araññasmiṁ brahāvane araññāniyaṁ
atk-s0508a13:339_2: ḍaṁsādiparissaye sato sampajāno adhivāseyya, adhivāsetvā ca bhāvanābalena mārabalaṁ vidhameyya.
atk-s0508a13:340_0: Yathā brahmāti yathā brahmā ekako cittappakoparahito jhānasukhena niccameva sukhito
atk-s0508a13:340_1: viharati tathā ekoti bhikkhupi eko adutiyo vivekasukhamanubrūhento sukhaṁ viharati.
atk-s0508a13:340_2: Ekassa sāmaññasukhaṁ paṇītanti hi vuttaṁ. Etena ekavihārī bhikkhu “brahmasamo”ti
atk-s0508a13:340_3: ovādaṁ deti. Yathā devo tathā duveti yathā devānaṁ antarantarā cittappakopopi siyā,
atk-s0508a13:340_4: tathā dvinnaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ sahavāse ghaṭṭanāpi bhaveyyāti sadutiyavāsena bhikkhu “devasamo”ti
atk-s0508a13:340_5: vutto. Yathā gāmo tathā tayoti asmimeva pāṭhe tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ sahavāso gāmavāsasadiso
atk-s0508a13:340_6: vivekavāso na hotīti adhippāyo. Kolāhalaṁ tatuttarinti tato tayato upari ca bahūnaṁ
atk-s0508a13:340_7: saṁvāso kolāhalaṁ uccāsaddamahāsaddamahājanasannipātasadiso, tasmā ekavihārinā bhavitabbanti adhippāyoti.
atk-s0508a13:343_0: Ahu tuyhaṁ pure saddhāti āyasmato sāṭimattiyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a13:343_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a13:343_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a13:343_3: tālavaṇṭaṁ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a13:343_4: magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā sāṭimattiyoti laddhanāmo vayappatto hetusampannatāya
atk-s0508a13:343_5: āraññakabhikkhūnaṁ santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a13:349_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā bhikkhū ovadati anusāsati bahū ca satte dhammaṁ kathetvā saraṇesu
atk-s0508a13:349_1: ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpesi. Aññatarañca kulaṁ assaddhaṁ appasannaṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ
atk-s0508a13:349_2: akāsi. Tena tasmiṁ kule manussā there abhippasannā ahesuṁ. Tatthekā dārikā abhirūpā
atk-s0508a13:349_3: dassanīyā theraṁ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṁ sakkaccaṁ bhojanena parivisati. Athekadivasaṁ
atk-s0508a13:349_4: māro “evaṁ imassa ayaso vaḍḍhissati, appatiṭṭho bhavissatī”ti cintetvā therassa rūpena
atk-s0508a13:349_5: gantvā taṁ dārikaṁ hatthe aggahesi. Dārikā “nāyaṁ manussasamphasso”ti ca aññāsi,
atk-s0508a13:349_6: hatthañca muñcāpesi. Taṁ disvā gharajano there appasādaṁ janesi. Punadivase thero
atk-s0508a13:349_7: taṁ kāraṇaṁ anāvajjento taṁ gharaṁ agamāsi. Tattha manussā anādaraṁ akaṁsu. Thero
atk-s0508a13:349_8: taṁ kāraṇaṁ āvajjento mārassa kiriyaṁ disvā “tassa gīvāyaṁ kukkurakuṇapaṁ paṭimuñcatū”ti
atk-s0508a13:349_9: adhiṭṭhahitvā tassa mocanatthaṁ upagatena mārena atītadivase katakiriyaṁ kathāpetvā
atk-s0508a13:349_10: taṁ tajjetvā vissajjesi. Taṁ disvā gharasāmiko “khamatha, bhante, accaya”nti khamāpetvā
atk-s0508a13:349_11: “ajjatagge ahameva, bhante, tumhe upaṭṭhahāmī”ti āha. Thero tassa dhammaṁ kathento –
atk-s0508a13:351: “Ahu tuyhaṁ pure saddhā, sā te ajja na vijjati;
atk-s0508a13:352: Yaṁ tuyhaṁ tuyhamevetaṁ, natthi duccaritaṁ mama.
atk-s0508a13:354: “Aniccā hi calā saddhā, evaṁ diṭṭhā hi sā mayā;
atk-s0508a13:355: Rajjantipi virajjanti, tattha kiṁ jiyyate muni.
atk-s0508a13:357: “Paccati munino bhattaṁ, thokaṁ thokaṁ kule kule;
atk-s0508a13:360_0: Tattha ahu tuyhaṁ pure saddhā, sā te ajja na vijjatīti, upāsaka, ito pubbe tava mayi
atk-s0508a13:360_1: “ayyo dhammacārī samacārī”tiādinā saddhā ahosi, sā saddhā te tava ajja idāni na upalabbhati.
atk-s0508a13:360_2: Tasmā yaṁ tuyhaṁ tuyhamevetanti catupaccayadānaṁ, tuyhameva etaṁ hotu, na tena mayhaṁ
atk-s0508a13:360_3: attho, sammā pasannacittena hi dānaṁ nāma dātabbanti adhippāyo. Atha vā yaṁ tuyhaṁ
atk-s0508a13:360_4: tuyhamevetanti yaṁ tava mayi ajja agāravaṁ pavattaṁ, taṁ tuyhameva, tassa phalaṁ
atk-s0508a13:360_5: tayā eva paccanubhavitabbaṁ, na mayāti attho. Natthi duccaritaṁ mamāti mama pana
atk-s0508a13:360_6: duccaritaṁ nāma natthi maggeneva duccaritahetūnaṁ kilesānaṁ samucchinnattā.
atk-s0508a13:361_0: Aniccā hi calā saddhāti yasmā pothujjanikā saddhā aniccā ekantikā na hoti, tato eva
atk-s0508a13:361_1: calā assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍaṁ viya, thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇukaṁ viya ca anavaṭṭhitā.
atk-s0508a13:361_2: Evaṁ diṭṭhā hi sā mayāti evaṁ bhūtā ca sā saddhā mayā tayi diṭṭhā paccakkhato viditā.
atk-s0508a13:361_3: Rajjantipi virajjantīti evaṁ tassā anavaṭṭhitattā eva ime sattā kadāci katthaci mittasanthavavasena
atk-s0508a13:361_4: rajjanti sinehampi karonti, kadāci virajjanti virattacittā honti. Tattha kiṁ jiyyate
atk-s0508a13:361_5: munīti tasmiṁ puthujjanānaṁ rajjane virajjane ca muni pabbajito kiṁ jiyyati, kā tassa hānīti attho.
atk-s0508a13:362_0: “Sace mama paccaye na gaṇhatha, kathaṁ tumhe yāpethā”ti evaṁ mā cintayīti dassento
atk-s0508a13:362_1: “paccatī”ti gāthamāha. Tassattho munino pabbajitassa bhattaṁ nāma kule kule anugharaṁ
atk-s0508a13:362_2: divase divase thokaṁ thokaṁ paccate, na ca tuyhaṁ eva gehe. Piṇḍikāya carissāmi,
atk-s0508a13:362_3: atthi jaṅghabalaṁ mamāti atthi me jaṅghabalaṁ, nāhaṁ obhaggajaṅgho na khañjo na ca
atk-s0508a13:362_4: pādarogī, tasmā piṇḍikāya missakabhikkhāya carissāmi, “yathāpi bhamaro puppha”ntiādinā
atk-s0508a13:362_5: satthārā vuttanayena piṇḍāya caritvā yāpessāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0508a13:365_0: Saddhāyaabhinikkhammāti āyasmato upālittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a13:365_1: bhagavato kāle haṁsavatīnagare kulaghare nibbatto ekadivasaṁ satthu dhammaṁ suṇanto
atk-s0508a13:365_2: satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ vinayadharānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā adhikārakammaṁ
atk-s0508a13:365_3: katvā taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ patthesi. So yāvajīvaṁ kusalaṁ katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto
atk-s0508a13:365_4: imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kappakagehe paṭisandhiṁ gaṇhi, upālītissa nāmaṁ akaṁsu. So vayappatto
atk-s0508a13:365_5: anuruddhādīnaṁ channaṁ khattiyānaṁ pasādako hutvā tathāgate anupiyambavane viharante
atk-s0508a13:365_6: pabbajanatthāya nikkhamantehi chahi khattiyehi saddhiṁ nikkhamitvā pabbaji. Tassa
atk-s0508a13:366_0: So pabbajitvā upasampanno satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā “mayhaṁ, bhante, araññavāsaṁ
atk-s0508a13:366_1: anujānāthā”ti āha. Bhikkhu tava araññe vasantassa ekameva dhuraṁ vaḍḍhissati, amhākaṁ
atk-s0508a13:366_2: pana santike vasantassa ganthadhurañca vipassanādhurañca paripūressatīti. Thero satthu
atk-s0508a13:366_3: vacanaṁ sampaṭicchitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne –
atk-s0508a13:370: Lakkhaṇe itihāse ca, sadhamme pāramiṁ gato.
atk-s0508a13:372: Carakā tāpasā ceva, caranti mahiyā tadā.
atk-s0508a13:374: Bahujjano maṁ pūjeti, nāhaṁ pūjemi kiñcanaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:376: Buddhoti vacanaṁ natthi, tāva nuppajjate jino.
atk-s0508a13:378: Sabbaṁ tamaṁ vinodetvā, loke uppajji cakkhumā.
atk-s0508a13:381: “Pitu atthāya so buddho, dhammaṁ desesi cakkhumā;
atk-s0508a13:382: Tena kālena parisā, samantā yojanaṁ tadā.
atk-s0508a13:388: Aṭṭhame divase patte, sunandaṁ kittayī jino.
atk-s0508a13:392: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a13:396: Hāsayanto janaṁ sabbaṁ, dassayanto sakaṁ balaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:399: “Tattha me ahu saṅkappo, sutvāna munino vacaṁ;
atk-s0508a13:400: Ahampi kāraṁ kassāmi, yathā passāmi gotamaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:404: Vinaye agganikkhitto, taṁ ṭhānaṁ patthaye ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:406: Tena bhogena buddhassa, ārāmaṁ māpaye ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:416: Mā naṁ koci viheṭhesi, santacittāna tādinaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:430: Sobhano nāma ārāmo, sampaṭiccha tuvaṁ muni.
atk-s0508a13:437: “Hatthī assā rathā pattī, senā ca caturaṅginī;
atk-s0508a13:452: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a13:454: Upāli nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a13:465: “Bhave sātaṁ na vindāmi, ḍayhanto tīhi aggibhi;
atk-s0508a13:470: Taṁ pivitvā sukhī assa, visamhā parimuttiyā.
atk-s0508a13:480: Tassa so vihane bhūtaṁ, samūlañca vināsaye.
atk-s0508a13:484: So me tamaṁ vinodesi, bhūtavejjova bhūtakaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:498: Devānaṁ sā piyā evaṁ, āsāvatī latuttamā.
atk-s0508a13:500: Sāyaṁ pātaṁ namassāmi, devā āsāvatiṁ yathā.
atk-s0508a13:502: Dūrāgatampi maṁ santaṁ, khaṇoyaṁ na virādhayi.
atk-s0508a13:508: Meghesu gajjamānesu, gabbhaṁ gaṇhanti tā sadā.
atk-s0508a13:509: “Cirampi gabbhaṁ dhārenti, yāva megho na gajjati;
atk-s0508a13:518: Caturo ca phale sabbe, dhammevaṁ vijanayiṁ ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:522: Na me samasamo atthi, dhāremi sāsanaṁ ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:524: Ettha me vimati natthi, akkhare byañjanepi vā.
atk-s0508a13:530: Anaññātaṁ mayā natthi, ekaggo satthu sāsane.
atk-s0508a13:538: Aṭṭālake ca vividhe, kāraye nagare bahū.
atk-s0508a13:544: Mā me bhaṇḍaṁ vinassīti, bhaṇḍarakkhaṁ ṭhapeti so.
atk-s0508a13:545: “Mamatto hoti yo rañño, vuddhiṁ yassa ca icchati;
atk-s0508a13:556: Saddhā te esikā vīra, dvārapālo ca saṁvaro.
atk-s0508a13:562: Āneñjañca nirodho ca, esā dhammakuṭī tava.
atk-s0508a13:566: Kolito nāma nāmena, porohicco tavaṁ mune.
atk-s0508a13:570: Ānando nāma nāmena, dhammārakkho tavaṁ mune.
atk-s0508a13:574: Tattha me cintanā natthi, taññevatthaṁ kathemahaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:576: Vinaye mādiso natthi, kuto bhiyyo bhavissati.
atk-s0508a13:578: Upālissa samo natthi, vinaye khandhakesu ca.
atk-s0508a13:584: So me attho anuppatto, vinaye pāramiṁ gato.
atk-s0508a13:586: Vijahitvāna taṁ jātiṁ, putto jāto mahesino.
atk-s0508a13:589: “Tassa rañño ahaṁ putto, candano nāma khattiyo;
atk-s0508a13:594: Āruyha sirikaṁ nāgaṁ, nagarā nikkhamiṁ tadā.
atk-s0508a13:596: Devalo nāma sambuddho, āgacchi purato mama.
atk-s0508a13:598: Tato sañjātakopo so, nāgo nuddharate padaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:601: “Sātaṁ tattha na vindāmi, siro pajjalito yathā;
atk-s0508a13:608: Purā sabbe vinassāma, khamāpessāma taṁ muniṁ.
atk-s0508a13:620: Pariḷāhaṁ vinodehi, mā no raṭṭhaṁ vināsaya.
atk-s0508a13:622: Ayomayena kūṭena, siraṁ bhindeyyu me sadā.
atk-s0508a13:623: “Dake aggi na saṇṭhāti, bījaṁ sele na rūhati;
atk-s0508a13:624: Agade kimi na saṇṭhāti, kopo buddhe na jāyati.
atk-s0508a13:625: “Yathā ca bhūmi acalā, appameyyo ca sāgaro;
atk-s0508a13:626: Anantako ca ākāso, evaṁ buddhā akhobhiyā.
atk-s0508a13:628: Khantānaṁ khamitānañca, gamanaṁ taṁ na vijjati.
atk-s0508a13:632: Samatikkamma taṁ jātiṁ, pāvisiṁ abhayaṁ puraṁ.
atk-s0508a13:638: Atthaṁ tuyhaṁ pavakkhāmi, yathā diṭṭhaṁ padaṁ mama.
atk-s0508a13:641: “Mā vo khaṇaṁ virādhetha, khaṇātītā hi socare;
atk-s0508a13:648: Āsīviso diṭṭhaviso, evaṁ jhāpeti taṁ naraṁ.
atk-s0508a13:652: Sadevakaṁ so tāreti, tasmā te avirādhiyā.
atk-s0508a13:654: Pathavīsadisā buddhā, tasmā te na virādhiyā.
atk-s0508a13:656: Rāhule dhanapāle ca, sabbesaṁ samako muni.
atk-s0508a13:666: Kappemi vinaye vāsaṁ, vinayo mama gocaro.
atk-s0508a13:668: Upāli taṁ mahāvīra, pāde vandati satthuno.
atk-s0508a13:669: “So ahaṁ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṁ purā puraṁ;
atk-s0508a13:672_0: Tattha hi naṁ satthā sayameva sakalaṁ vinayapiṭakaṁ uggaṇhāpesi. So aparabhāge bhārukacchakavatthuṁ
atk-s0508a13:672_1: ajjukavatthuṁ kumārakassapavatthunti imāni tīṇi vatthūni vinicchayi. Satthā ekekasmiṁ
atk-s0508a13:672_2: vinicchite sādhukāraṁ datvā tayopi vinicchaye aṭṭhuppattiṁ katvā theraṁ vinayadharānaṁ
atk-s0508a13:672_3: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. So aparabhāge ekasmiṁ uposathadivase pātimokkhuddesasamaye bhikkhū ovadanto –
atk-s0508a13:678: Saṅghasmiṁ viharaṁ bhikkhu, sikkhetha vinayaṁ budho.
atk-s0508a13:681: Kappākappesu kusalo, careyya apurakkhato”ti. – tisso gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a13:682_0: Tattha saddhāyāti saddhānimittaṁ, na jīvikatthanti attho. Saddhāyāti vā kammaphalāni
atk-s0508a13:682_1: ratanattayaguṇañca saddahitvā. Abhinikkhammāti gharāvāsato nikkhamitvā. Navapabbajitoti
atk-s0508a13:682_2: navo hutvā pabbajito, paṭhamavaye eva pabbajito. Navoti sāsane sikkhāya abhinavo
atk-s0508a13:682_3: daharo. Mitte bhajeyya kalyāṇe suddhājīve atanditeti “piyo garu bhāvanīyo”tiādinā
atk-s0508a13:682_4: vuttalakkhaṇe kalyāṇamitte, micchājīvavivajjanena suddhājīve, āraddhavīriyatāya atandite
atk-s0508a13:682_5: bhajeyya upasaṅkameyya, tesaṁ ovādānusāsanīpaṭiggahaṇavasena seveyya. Saṅghasmiṁ
atk-s0508a13:682_6: viharanti saṅghe bhikkhusamūhe vattapaṭivattapūraṇavasena viharanto. Sikkhetha vinayaṁ
atk-s0508a13:682_7: budhoti bodhañāṇatāsukusalo hutvā vinayapariyattiṁ sikkheyya. Vinayo hi sāsanassa
atk-s0508a13:682_8: āyu, tasmiṁ ṭhite sāsanaṁ ṭhitaṁ hoti. “Buddho”ti ca paṭhanti, so evattho. Kappākappesūti
atk-s0508a13:682_9: kappiyākappiyesu kusalo suttavasena suttānulomavasena ca nipuṇo cheko. Apurakkhatoti
atk-s0508a13:682_10: na purakkhato taṇhādīhi kutoci purekkhāraṁ apaccāsīsanto hutvā vihareyya.
atk-s0508a13:685_0: Paṇḍitaṁ vata maṁ santanti āyasmato uttarapālattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a13:685_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a13:685_2: gamanamagge setuṁ kārāpesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a13:685_3: buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā uttarapāloti laddhanāmo vayappatto
atk-s0508a13:685_4: yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṁ karoti. Tassa ekadivasaṁ
atk-s0508a13:685_5: ayonisomanasikāravasena anubhūtārammaṇaṁ anussarantassa kāmarāgo uppajji. So tāvadeva
atk-s0508a13:685_6: sahoḍḍhaṁ coraṁ gaṇhanto viya attano cittaṁ niggahetvā saṁvegajāto paṭipakkhamanasikārena
atk-s0508a13:685_7: kilese vikkhambhetvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto bhāvanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a13:691: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā sīhanādaṁ nadanto –
atk-s0508a13:694: Pañca kāmaguṇā loke, sammohā pātayiṁsu maṁ.
atk-s0508a13:699: “Sabbe kāmā pahīnā me, bhavā sabbe padālitā;
atk-s0508a13:702_0: Tattha paṇḍitaṁ vata maṁ santanti sutacintāmayāya paññāya vasena paññāsampannampi
atk-s0508a13:702_1: nāma maṁ samānaṁ. Alamatthavicintakanti attano ca paresañca atthaṁ hitaṁ vicintetuṁ
atk-s0508a13:702_2: samatthaṁ, alaṁ vā pariyattaṁ atthassa vicintakaṁ, kilesaviddhaṁsanasamatthaṁ atthadassinaṁ
atk-s0508a13:702_3: vā, sabbametaṁ attano antimabhavikatāya thero vadati. Pañca kāmaguṇāti rūpādayo pañca
atk-s0508a13:702_4: kāmakoṭṭhāsā. Loketi tesaṁ pavattiṭṭhānadassanaṁ. Sammohāti sammohanimittaṁ ayonisomanasikārahetu.
atk-s0508a13:702_5: Sammohāti vā sammohanā sammohakarā. Pātayiṁsūti dhīrabhāvato pātesuṁ, lokato vā uttaritukāmaṁ
atk-s0508a13:703_0: Pakkhandoti anupaviṭṭho. Māravisayeti kilesavisaye kilesamārassa pavattiṭṭhāne, tassa
atk-s0508a13:703_1: vasaṁ gatoti adhippāyo. Devaputtamārassa vā issariyaṭṭhāne taṁ anupavisitvā ṭhito.
atk-s0508a13:703_2: Daḷhasallasamappitoti daḷhaṁ thiraṁ, daḷhena vā sallena samappito, rāgasallena hadayaṁ
atk-s0508a13:703_3: āhacca viddho. Asakkhiṁ maccurājassa, ahaṁ pāsā pamuccitunti aggamaggasaṇḍāsena rāgādisallaṁ
atk-s0508a13:703_4: anavasesato uddharantoyeva rāgabandhanasaṅkhātā maccurājassa pāsā ahaṁ parimuccituṁ
atk-s0508a13:704_0: Tato eva ca sabbe kāmā pahīnā me, bhavā sabbe padālitāti vatthārammaṇādibhedena anekabhedabhinnā
atk-s0508a13:704_1: sabbe kilesakāmā ariyamaggena samucchedavasena mayā pahīnā. Kilesakāmesu hi pahīnesu
atk-s0508a13:704_2: vatthukāmāpi pahīnā eva honti. Tathā kāmabhavakammabhavādayo bhavā sabbe maggañāṇāsinā
atk-s0508a13:704_3: padālitā viddhaṁsitā. Kammabhavesu hi padālitesu upapattibhavā padālitā eva honti.
atk-s0508a13:704_4: Evaṁ kammabhavānaṁ padālitattā eva vikkhīṇo jātisaṁsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavoti.
atk-s0508a13:704_5: Tassattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Idameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇaṁ ahosi.
atk-s0508a13:707_0: Suṇāthañātayo sabbeti āyasmato abhibhūtattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a13:707_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vessabhussa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a13:707_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto tādisena kalyāṇamittasannissayena sāsane abhippasanno
atk-s0508a13:707_3: ahosi. So satthari parinibbute tassa dhātuṁ gahetuṁ mahājane ussāhaṁ karonte sayaṁ
atk-s0508a13:707_4: sabbapaṭhamaṁ gandhodakena citakaṁ nibbāpesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a13:707_5: saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde veṭhapuranagare rājakule nibbattitvā abhibhūtoti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a13:707_6: pitu accayena rajjaṁ kāreti. Tasmiñca samaye bhagavā janapadacārikaṁ caranto anupubbena
atk-s0508a13:707_7: taṁ nagaraṁ pāpuṇi. Tato so rājā “bhagavā kira mama nagaraṁ anuppatto”ti sutvā satthu
atk-s0508a13:707_8: santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ sutvā dutiyadivase mahādānaṁ pavattesi. Bhagavā bhuttāvī
atk-s0508a13:707_9: tassa rañño ajjhāsayānurūpaṁ anumodanaṁ karontoyeva vitthārato dhammaṁ desesi. So
atk-s0508a13:707_10: dhammaṁ sutvā laddhappasādo rajjaṁ pahāya pabbajitvā arahattaṁ sacchākāsi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne –
atk-s0508a13:713_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā vimuttisukhena viharante tasmiṁ tassa ñātakā amaccā pārisajjā
atk-s0508a13:713_1: nāgarā jānapadāti sabbe samāgantvā, “bhante, kasmā tvaṁ amhe anāthe katvā pabbajito”ti
atk-s0508a13:713_2: parideviṁsu. Thero te ñātipamukhe manusse paridevante disvā tesaṁ attano pabbajjakāraṇavibhāvanamukhena dhammaṁ kathento –
atk-s0508a13:716: Dhammaṁ vo desayissāmi, dukkhā jāti punappunaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:722: Pahāya jātisaṁsāraṁ, dukkhassantaṁ karissatī”ti. – tisso gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a13:723_0: Tattha suṇāthāti nisāmetha, idāni mayā vuccamānaṁ ohitasotā sotadvārānusārena upadhārethāti
atk-s0508a13:723_1: attho. Ñātayoti ñātī pamukhe katvā tesaṁ sabbesaṁ ālapanaṁ, tenāha “sabbe yāvantettha
atk-s0508a13:723_2: samāgatā”ti, yāvanto yattakā ettha samāgame, etissaṁ vā mama pabbajjāya samāgatāti attho.
atk-s0508a13:724_0: Idāni yaṁ sandhāya “suṇāthā”ti savanāṇattikavacanaṁ kataṁ, taṁ “dhammaṁ vo desayissāmī”ti
atk-s0508a13:724_1: paṭijānitvā “dukkhā jāti punappuna”ntiādinā desetuṁ ārabhi. Tattha dukkhā jāti punappunanti
atk-s0508a13:724_2: jāti nāmesā gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedassa jarādibhedassa ca anekavihitassa dukkhassa
atk-s0508a13:724_3: adhiṭṭhānabhāvato dukkhā. Sā punappunaṁ pavattamānā ativiya dukkhā.
atk-s0508a13:725_0: Tassā pana jātiyā samatikkamanatthaṁ ussāho karaṇīyoti dassento āha “ārambhathā”tiādi.
atk-s0508a13:725_1: Tattha ārambhathāti ārambhadhātusaṅkhātaṁ vīriyaṁ karotha. Nikkamathāti kosajjapakkhato
atk-s0508a13:725_2: nikkhantattā nikkamadhātusaṅkhātaṁ taduttariṁ vīriyaṁ karotha. Yuñjatha buddhasāsaneti
atk-s0508a13:725_3: yasmā sīlasaṁvaro indriyesu guttadvāratā bhojane mattaññutā satisampajaññanti imesu
atk-s0508a13:725_4: dhammesu patiṭṭhitānaṁ jāgariyānuyogavasena ārambhanikkamadhātuyo sampajjanti, tasmā
atk-s0508a13:725_5: tathābhūtā samathavipassanāsaṅkhāte adhisīlasikkhādisaṅkhāte vā bhagavato sāsane
atk-s0508a13:725_6: yuttappayuttā hotha. Dhunātha maccuno senaṁ, naḷāgāraṁva kuñjaroti evaṁ paṭipajjantā
atk-s0508a13:725_7: ca tedhātuissarassa maccurājassa vasaṁ satte netīti tassa senāsaṅkhātaṁ abalaṁ dubbalaṁ
atk-s0508a13:725_8: yathā nāma thāmabalūpapanno kuñjaro naḷehi kataṁ agāraṁ khaṇeneva viddhaṁseti, evameva
atk-s0508a13:726: Evaṁ pana buddhasāsane ussāhaṁ karontassa ekaṁsiko jātidukkhassa samatikkamoti dassento “yo imasmi”ntiādinā tatiyaṁ gāthamāha. Taṁ suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0508a13:729_0: Saṁsaranti āyasmato gotamattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṁ kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro
atk-s0508a13:729_1: tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto sikhimhi bhagavati parinibbute tassa citakaṁ
atk-s0508a13:729_2: devamanussesu pūjentesu aṭṭhahi campakapupphehi citakaṁ pūjesi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a13:729_3: devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sakyarājakule nibbattitvā gotamoti gottavaseneva
atk-s0508a13:729_4: abhilakkhitanāmo vayappatto satthu ñātisamāgame paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a13:729_5: kammaṁ karonto chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne –
atk-s0508a13:735_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā vimuttisukhena viharanto ekadivasaṁ ñātakehi “kasmā, bhante,
atk-s0508a13:735_1: amhe pahāya pabbajito”ti puṭṭho saṁsāre attanā anubhūtadukkhañceva idāni adhigataṁ
atk-s0508a13:738: Dukkhamamhipi tiracchānayoniyaṁ, nekadhā hi vusitaṁ ciraṁ mayā.
atk-s0508a13:744: Taṁ viditvā mahamahattasambhavaṁ, santimeva satimā samajjhaga”nti. –
atk-s0508a13:746_0: Tattha saṁsaranti anādimati saṁsāre saṁsaranto kammakilesehi pañcasu gatīsu cavanupapātavasena
atk-s0508a13:746_1: aparāparaṁ saṁsarantoti attho. Hīti nipātamattaṁ. Nirayaṁ agacchissanti sañjīvādikaṁ
atk-s0508a13:746_2: aṭṭhavidhaṁ mahānirayaṁ, kukkuḷādikaṁ soḷasavidhaṁ ussadanirayañca paṭisandhivasena
atk-s0508a13:746_3: upagacchiṁ. “Punappuna”nti idaṁ idhāpi ānetabbaṁ. Petalokanti pettivisayaṁ, khuppipāsādibhedaṁ
atk-s0508a13:746_4: petattabhāvanti attho. Agamanti paṭisandhivasena upagacchiṁ upapajjiṁ. Punappunanti
atk-s0508a13:746_7: tiracchānayoniyaṁ. Nekadhā hīti oṭṭhagoṇagadrabhādivasena ceva kākabalākakulalādivasena
atk-s0508a13:746_8: ca anekappakāraṁ anekavārañca ciraṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ mayā vusitaṁ niccaṁ utrastamānasatādivasena
atk-s0508a13:746_9: dukkhaṁ anubhūtaṁ. Tiracchānayoniyaṁ nibbattasatto mahāmūḷhatāya cirataraṁ tattheva
atk-s0508a13:747_0: Mānusopi ca bhavobhirādhitoti manussattabhāvopi mayā tādisena kusalakammunā samavāyena
atk-s0508a13:747_1: abhirādhito sādhito adhigato. Kāṇakacchapopamasuttamettha udāharitabbaṁ. Saggakāyamagamaṁ
atk-s0508a13:747_2: sakiṁ sakinti saggagatisaṅkhātaṁ kāmāvacaradevakāyaṁ sakiṁ sakiṁ kadāci kadāci upapajjanavasena
atk-s0508a13:747_4: arūpabhavesu. Nevasaññisu asaññisuṭṭhitanti rūpārūpadhātūsu ca na kevalaṁ saññīsu
atk-s0508a13:747_5: eva, atha kho nevasaññīnāsaññīsu asaññīsu ca upapajja ṭhitaṁ mayāti ānetvā yojetabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:747_6: Nevasaññiggahaṇena hettha nevasaññīnāsaññībhavo gahito. Yadipime dve bhavā rūpārūpadhātuggahaṇeneva
atk-s0508a13:747_7: gayhanti, ye pana ito bāhirakā tattha niccasaññino bhavavimokkhasaññino ca, tesaṁ
atk-s0508a13:747_8: tassā saññāya micchābhāvadassanatthaṁ visuṁ gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:748_0: Evaṁ dvīhi gāthāhi bhavamūlassa anupacchinnattā anādimati saṁsāre attano vaṭṭadukkhānubhavaṁ
atk-s0508a13:748_1: dassetvā idāni tadupacchedena vivaṭṭasukhānubhavaṁ dassento “sambhavā”tiādinā tatiyaṁ
atk-s0508a13:748_2: gāthamāha. Tattha sambhavāti bhavā. Kāmabhavādayo eva hi hetupaccayasamavāyena bhavantīti
atk-s0508a13:748_3: idha sambhavāti vuttā. Suviditāti vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya suṭṭhu viditā.
atk-s0508a13:748_4: Asārakātiādi tesaṁ viditākāradassanaṁ. Tattha asārakāti niccasārādisārarahitā. Saṅkhatāti
atk-s0508a13:748_5: samecca sambhuyya paccayehi katā. Pacalitāti saṅkhatattā eva uppādajarādīhi pakārato
atk-s0508a13:748_6: calitā anavaṭṭhitā. Saderitāti sadā sabbakālaṁ bhaṅgena eritā, ittarā bhaṅgagāmino
atk-s0508a13:748_7: pabhaṅgunoti attho. Taṁ viditvāmahamattasambhavanti taṁ yathāvuttaṁ saṅkhatasabhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a13:748_8: attasambhavaṁ attani sambhūtaṁ attāyattaṁ issarādivasena aparāyattaṁ pariññābhisamayavasena
atk-s0508a13:748_9: ahaṁ viditvā tappaṭipakkhabhūtaṁ santimeva nibbānameva maggapaññāsatiyā satimā hutvā
atk-s0508a13:748_10: samajjhagaṁ adhigacchiṁ ariyamaggabhāvanāya anuppattoti. Evaṁ thero ñātakānaṁ dhammadesanāmukhena aññaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a13:751_0: Yo pubbe karaṇīyānīti āyasmato hāritattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a13:751_1: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto satthari parinibbute tassa citakapūjāya
atk-s0508a13:751_2: kayiramānāya gandhena pūjaṁ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto
atk-s0508a13:751_3: imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā hāritoti laddhanāmo vayappatto
atk-s0508a13:751_4: jātimānaṁ nissāya aññe vasalavādena samudācarati. So bhikkhūnaṁ santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ
atk-s0508a13:751_5: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitopi ciraparicitattā vasalasamudācāraṁ na vissajji.
atk-s0508a13:751_6: Athekadivasaṁ satthu santike dhammaṁ sutvā sañjātasaṁvego vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a13:751_7: attano cittappavattiṁ upaparikkhanto mānuddhaccaviggahitataṁ disvā taṁ pahāya vipassanaṁ
atk-s0508a13:751_8: ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne –
atk-s0508a13:757: Arahā pana hutvā vimuttisukhaṁ anubhavanto “yo pubbe karaṇīyānī”tiādinā tīhi gāthāhi bhikkhūnaṁ ovādadānamukhena aññaṁ byākāsi. Tāsaṁ attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-s0508a13:760_0: Pāpamitteti āyasmato vimalattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro
atk-s0508a13:760_1: tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a13:760_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto satthari parinibbute sādhukīḷanadivasesu
atk-s0508a13:760_3: vītivattesu satthu sarīraṁ gahetvā upāsakesu jhāpanaṭṭhānaṁ gacchantesu satthu guṇe
atk-s0508a13:760_4: āvajjitvā pasannamānaso sumanapupphehi pūjamakāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a13:760_5: saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde bārāṇasiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vimaloti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a13:760_6: vayappatto somamittattheraṁ nissāya sāsane pabbajitvā teneva ussāhito vipassanaṁ
atk-s0508a13:760_7: paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne –
atk-s0508a13:766: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano sahāyassa bhikkhussa ovādaṁ dento –
atk-s0508a13:769: Ovāde cassa tiṭṭheyya, patthento acalaṁ sukhaṁ.
atk-s0508a13:778_0: Tattha pāpamitteti akalyāṇamitte asappurise hīnavīriye. Vivajjetvāti taṁ abhajanavasena
atk-s0508a13:778_1: dūrato vajjetvā. Bhajeyyuttamapuggalanti sappurisaṁ paṇḍitaṁ kalyāṇamittaṁ ovādānusāsanīgahaṇavasena
atk-s0508a13:778_2: seveyya. Ovāde cassa tiṭṭheyyāti assa kalyāṇamittassa ovāde anusiṭṭhiyaṁ yathānusiṭṭhaṁ
atk-s0508a13:778_3: paṭipajjanavasena tiṭṭheyya. Patthentoti ākaṅkhanto. Acalaṁ sukhanti nibbānasukhaṁ
atk-s0508a13:778_4: phalasukhañca. Tampi hi akuppabhāvato “acala”nti vuccati. Sesaṁ vuttatthameva.
